les for Drawing and other orname n;al branches.

ian. Particular attention is paid not only the manners

of worship and Sunday Schools their parents and guar


ans approve Exercise ard recreation being essential


the preservation Of health and Of mental energy occu.
py he intervals Of time not devoted to study The ns


ution, IN all ITS departments, is conducted in manner

s patrons.
